text:
Anna Ascani (born 17 October 1987) is an Italian politician. She has been the vice-president of the Democratic Party since 2019. She has also served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies since 2013. She was born in Città di Castello, Umbria.
On 14 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Ascani had tested positive to COVID-19.
